description: Improved post layout with responsive images and enhanced styling across the blog and admin editor.
changes: Improved post layout: Added responsive image styling to prevent large images from overflowing content areas.
Enhanced TinyMCE Editor: Applied consistent image styling within the admin editor for a better 'What You See Is What You Get' experience.
Fixed word-wrapping issues for long strings in post content and excerpts.
Implemented fully functional automatic background updates when enabled.
IMPORTANT: Fixed issue where config.php was overwritten during updates; your credentials and site settings are now preserved.
Added automatic update check notification to the admin dashboard.
Enhanced Upgrader class with remote manifest fetching and caching (1-hour TTL).
Implemented regex-based version updates for config.php to protect custom settings.
Added automatic OPcache reset after successful upgrades to ensure new files load immediately.
